pageContext.claim: “Rumor has it that Senator Joe Donnelly of Indiana is paying for Facebook ads for his so-called opponent on the libertarian ticket. Donnelly is trying to steal the election? Isn't that what Russia did!?”
pageContext.analysis: Whether or not Donnelly ran Facebook ads is beside the point. There's no legal issue with running ads. Donnelly wasn't collaborating with a foreign government to influence an election. Furthermore, he is not a foreign actor using creating fake persona to influence a domestic election, which is essentially what Russia did.
